page.title: 03A VIEW OF BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content: AND HAS DECORATIVE ORANGE RIDGE TILES. THE CHAPEL IS USED FOR JUNIOR YOUTH CLUB AND SERVICES.IT IS ALSO USED FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS LIKE HARVEST FESTIVAL AND ANNIVERSARY. THE{PARISH HALL}IS USED BY MANY ORGANISATIONS.THERE IS A SKITTLE ALLEY ADJOINING THE PARISH HALL.THERE IS A KITCHEN IN THE PARISH HALL WHICH IS USED FOR MAKING TEA AND BISCUITS . WE HAVE ONE MAIN{SHOP}WHICH SELLS FOOD ,SWEETS ,TOYS AND HOUSEHOLD ACCESSORIES AS WELL AS BEING A{POST {OFFICE.}WE ALSO HAVE A{BUTCHERS}WHICH SELLS MEAT AND MILK. THERE IS A{PUB}CALLED THE COACH AND HORSES WHICH IS THE ONLY BUILDING IN THE VILLAGE WITH A THATCHED ROOF.IT IS A 13TH CENTURY BUILDING AND THE WALLS ARE MADE OF COB,STONE AND CONCRETE BLOCK.IT ALSO HAS A{BEER GARDEN}WITH A BIG POND.
